getTypeList.label: 分类列表
getTypeList.value: function (context, params) {return new Promise(resolve => {const {baseUrl,source} = params;const {http,ERR_OK,ERR_FALSE,replaceHTML} = context;http.get(baseUrl, {headers: {Referer: baseUrl,'user-agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/78.0.3904.108 Safari/537.36'}}).then((res) => {let str = replaceHTML(res.data);let lis = str.match(/<ul[^>]*id=([

]?)primary-menu\1[^>]*>*([\s\S]*?)/)[0].match(/]*>*([\s\S]*?)/ig);let list = [{label: '全部',value: '/',source: source}];if (lis) {lis.forEach((li, key) => {if (key < 5) {list.push({label: li.match(/]*>*([\s\S]*?)/)[1],value: li.match(/href="*([\s\S]*?)"/)[1].match(/category/*([\s\S]* )/)[1],source: source});}})}resolve({code: ERR_OK,data: {list: list,source: source}})}).catch((err) => {resolve({code: ERR_FALSE,data: {list: [],source: source}})})})}

getTypeDetail.label: 分类详情
getTypeDetail.value: function (context, params) {return new Promise(resolve => {const {baseUrl,source} = params;const {http,ERR_OK,ERR_FALSE,Book,replaceHTML,htmlDecodeByRegExp} = context;http.get(baseUrl + (params.id == '/' ? '/' : '/category/' + params.id + '/') + 'page/' + params.page, {headers: {Referer: baseUrl,Cookie: '__test; bnState={

:0}; __PPU_SESSION_1_1896694=1649821577968|1|1649821577968|1|1','user-agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/78.0.3904.108 Safari/537.36'}}).then(res => {let str = replaceHTML(res.data);let list = [];let lis = str.match(/<article[^>]*>*([\s\S]*?)</article>/ig);if (lis) {lis.forEach(li => {list.push(new Book({bookId: li.match(/href="*([\s\S]*?)"/)[1].match(/buzz/*([\s\S]*?).html/)[1],title: htmlDecodeByRegExp(li.match(/<div[^>]*class=([
]?)entry-excerpt\1[^>]*>*([\s\S]*?)/)[2].replace(/\s/g, '')) || '暂无标题',cover: li.match(/src="*([\s\S]*?)"/)[1],style: params.title,size: li.match(/[0-9]{1,3}Pics/)[0],updateTime: li.match(/]*class=([

]?)entry-date\1[^>]*>*([\s\S]*?)/)[0].match(/]*>*([\s\S]*?)/)[1].replace(/\s/g, ''),isEnd: true,isAdult: true,type: 'comic',source: source}))})}resolve({code: ERR_OK,data: {list: list,isLastPage: list.length < 8,currentPage: params.page,source: source}})}).catch(() => {resolve({code: ERR_FALSE,data: {list: [],isLastPage: false,currentPage: params.page - 1,source: source}})})})}

getDetail.label: 书籍详情
getDetail.value: function (context, params) {return new Promise(resolve => {const {baseUrl,source} = params;const {http,ERR_OK,ERR_FALSE,replaceHTML,htmlDecodeByRegExp,getTag,Chapter,} = context;http.get(baseUrl + '/' + params.id + '.html', {headers: {Referer: baseUrl,Host: baseUrl.replace('http://', ''),Cookie: '__test; bnState={

:0}','user-agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/78.0.3904.108 Safari/537.36'}}).then((res) => {let str = replaceHTML(res.data);let title = str.match(/<a[^>]*rel=([
]?)noreferrer noopener\1[^>]*>*([\s\S]*?)/);title = title ? htmlDecodeByRegExp(title[2]) : '';let tag = title ? getTag(source, title) : [];let tags = str.match(/]*rel=([

]?)entry-content clearfix\1[^>]*>*([\s\S]*?)/)[0].match(/]*>*([\s\S]*?)

/ig);if (imgs) {let content = [];imgs.forEach(img => {content.push(img.match(/src="*([\s\S]*?)"/)[1])});chapters.push(new Chapter({id: 'nsfwp_' + source,title: '全本' + '（' + content.length + 'P）',chapter: 1,isStart: true,isEnd: true,content: content}))}resolve({code: ERR_OK,data: {bookInfo: {title: title,tag: tag,isEnd: true},chapters: chapters,source: source}})}).catch((err) => {resolve({code: ERR_FALSE,data: {bookInfo: {},source: source}})})})}
